name: Darts Match 2
description:
Join in the fun with the most realistic Darts Game on iOS!

Come and play against the thousands of people playing Darts Match 2! Work your way up to become a professional darter and conquer the league table!

Play: ● Live Cricket ● Live 501 ● 301 ● Around the Clock

Flawless aim and swipe dart throwing, easy to pick up tough to master.

Check out some Darts Match 2 features:

● Take on opponents across the world!
● Let your rival know what you think using the in-game Chat!
● Level up and unlock Millions of dart combinations!
● Play like a pro on an Official Unicorn Eclipse HD2 dartboard, the dartboard used in all major PDC darts events
● Mountains of coins to be won in exclusive venues!

The sequel to Microsoft Beautiful Game winner Darts Match!

Support - If you experience any issues with Darts Match 2 or have a suggestion to improve it, we'd love to hear from you! Contact us in the app or on our support page.
